support.title: Support Center
support.description: We're here to help! Our customer support team is highly trained and ready to assist you.

message.label: Tell us about your company and how Slab can help you:

questions.question: What does Slab do?
questions.answer: SlaB Assets pioneers biodiversity asset tokenization, promoting environmental conservation. Biodiversity assets use CO2 as a metric unit, the tCO2eq. (ton of carbon dioxide equivalent), among other greenhouse gases present in all biomass, plus other ecosystem determinants from subsoil to atmosphere. We offer a secure and transparent Web3 platform for those who want to invest in the planet's future, preserving our ecosystems and generating positive impact.

questions.question: What is TBIO?
questions.answer: We use cutting-edge technology to tokenize biodiversity assets, ensuring secure and traceable trading on the blockchain. This innovation creates fractionalized digital units, facilitating global trading with full transparency, security, and tracking of each investment's positive impact.

questions.question: How do we do it?
questions.answer: Biodiversity asset generation is conducted with maximum security and transparency. The entire process, from inventory to certification, is handled by specialists and audited by third parties, ensuring traceability and immutability on the blockchain. Assets backed by CPR-Verde value 27 ecosystem services, including carbon capture, ensuring legal and financial security.

step-zero.title: Welcome to Slab!
step-zero.description: Create your account in 2 minutes and trade tokens quickly and reliably.

step-one.title: Choose an email
step-one.description: If this is your first time here, start the registration process by entering your email.

step-two.title: Now choose a password
step-two.description: Use letters, numbers and special characters.
step-two.disclaimer: By continuing you accept Slab Assets' Terms of Use and Privacy Policy and declare you are not a US person.

step-three.title: Verify your email!
step-three.description: Enter the code that was sent to your email.

metamask-register-login.title: Connect your wallet
metamask-register-login.paragraph-Wallet: Select the digital wallet you want to use.

signature.title: Create your account
signature.paragraph-register: Just one more step! Click below to sign and confirm the creation of your account with this wallet.
